definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: press, squeeze (NH id.; Targum [[מְעַח]]; Ar. ma9aka rub);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[וּמָעוּח]] [[וְכָתוּת וְנׇתוּק וְכָרוּת]] Le 22:24 (H), not to be offered to ´[[י]], reference to emasculation (cf. Di); [[וַחֲנִיתוֹ]] [[מְעוּכָה־בָאָרֶץ]] 1Sa 26:7 and his spear pressed (thrust) into the ground.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[שָׁמָּה מׂעֲכוּ שְׁדֵיהֶן]] Ez Eze 23:3 there were their breasts squeezed (‖[[עִשּׂוּ]]; unchastely; fig. of intercourse of Samaria and Jerus. with Egypt, involving idolatry).
